name: 8-bit Dungeon Quest (Early Access)
description:
Venture into the gloomy dungeon filled with puzzles, enemies, traps, and more! What could go wrong?

(WARNING: DO NOT ENTER FULL SCREEN WHILE GAME IS LOADING, OTHERWISE YOU MIGHT HAVE A BUGGED SCREEN)

NOTE: This game is in Early Access meaning that it is not finished and there may be bugs

If you do run into bugs please let me know in the comments

In-game Controls: ___________________________

'A and D' or 'LeftArrow and RightArrow' To move character

                

___________________________

'Space or UpArrow or W' to jump

                                              
___________________________

'LMB (Left Mouse Button)' to use weapon

___________________________

'Tab or click the symbol at the top right corner' to open in-game menu

                          ___________________________

Credits:

I made almost everything you see in the game except for some of the audio, Credits to the original owners of the audio.

Game made with Gdevelop.
